Package structure¶

Module contents¶

This package implements copper and extensions

copper.dataprocessor module¶

module for preprocess and postprocess data.

obtain average length of all itemsets of all sequences

Parameters:sequences (list) – database of sequences without preprocessing

Return type:int

cast patterns to string

Parameters:
  • raw_db (list) – database of sequences without preprocessing
  • result_pattern_list (list) – results patterns of sequential pattern mining
  • item_separated (bool) – True: items in itemsets which are in sequence are separated by colon False or blank: itemsets which are in sequence are separated by colon
Returns:

database decoded
Return type:

string

copper.dbpointer module¶

Pointer to Database class for use with Prefixspan. Different classes correspond to different functionality and capabilities. * DBPointer - Prefixspan * CopperPointer - COPPER * WindowGap - PrefixSpan with Time Constraints (Window/Gap) * WinCop - COPPER with Time Constraints with Time Constraints

Bases: copper.dbpointer.DBPointer

copper.logiceval module¶

Module for the Logical evaluation functionality of COPPER using ShuntingYard to Postfix notation and an evaluation tree to finally obtain a function that takes a pattern and returns if it fulfills the logical condition given on the generating options.

class copper.logiceval.Tree(root, left_leaf=None, read_leaf=None)¶

Abstract Syntax Tree

evaluate(dictionary)¶

Evaluate tree in semantic way.

Parameters:dictionary (string) – token string to analyze
Returns:Logical Expression Value
Return type:Boolean
show()¶

Show tree in a string

Returns:Leaf String Value
Return type:String

Parameters:
  • dictionary (dict)
  • token (string)
Returns:
Return type:

bool

Evaluate logical expression.

Parameters:logical_expression (string) – Logical expression to evaluate
Returns:Logical Expression Value
Return type:bool
copper.logiceval.postfixtotree(postfix_chain)¶

Populate Evaluation Tree with List in Postfix Notation

Parameters:postfix_chain (string) – postfix String used to populate a tree
Returns:List of tree leaves
Return type:Tree List
copper.logiceval.shuntingyard(token_chain)¶

Convert Infix Notation to Postfix Notation using Shunting Yard Algorithm.

Parameters:token_chain (string) – token string to analyze
Returns:Queue Char in Postfix Order
Return type:list

copper.metadata module¶

Package metadata

copper.prefixspan module¶

Implementation of Jiawei Han, Jian Pei, Behzad Mortazavi-Asl, Helen Pinto, Qiming Chen, Umeshwar Dayal, MC Hsu, Prefixspan Algorithm in Python.

With constraints added from Guevara-Cogorno, Flamand, Alatrista-Salas in COPPER Paper and Window/Time Gap constraints added from Alatrista-Salas, Guevara-Cogorno, Maehara, Nuñez del Prado in WinCOPPER Paper.

copper.prefixspan.prefixspan(sequences, raw_options)¶

Prefixspan entry call, takes a database in the null separator format and a dictionary of options and returns frequent patterns and their frequency.

Parameters:
  • sequences (List) – database
  • raw_options (List) – options used to configure
Returns:

frequent patterns list
Return type:

List
copper.prefixspan.validate_db(db, options)¶

validate if database contain only 1-itemsets or contain any k-itemset and is setted correctly

Parameters:
  • db (string) – Database to validate
  • options (dict) – options used to configure
Returns:

Value of validation
Return type:

boolean
